auth/authentication/index.title: Authentication & Hasura
auth/authentication/index.description: Explore our comprehensive guide on setting up Hasura authentication via JWT or a webhook service. Implement effective and secure authentication strategies by learning how to utilize session variables. Manage permissions and integrate with 3rd party authentication providers.

auth/authentication/jwt/index.title: Authentication Using JWTs
auth/authentication/jwt/index.description: Secure your Hasura requests by learning how to configure Hasura Engine for JWT mode. Understand how to extract session variable claim values, authenticate incoming requests using JWT for powerful access control.

auth/authentication/jwt/providers.title: Providers
auth/authentication/jwt/providers.description: While Hasura is designed to work with any JWT provider, there are several details for certain providers that are important to know.

auth/authentication/jwt/setup.title: Enabling JWT Authentication
auth/authentication/jwt/setup.description: Learn how to set up your Hasura DDN project with JWT mode to authenticate requests and apply access-control rules.

auth/authentication/jwt/setup-test-jwt.title: Set up a JWT for Testing
auth/authentication/jwt/setup-test-jwt.description: Learn how to set up a test token and jwt for graphql apis

auth/authentication/webhook/index.title: Authentication Using a Webhook
auth/authentication/webhook/index.description: Get comprehensive information on how to configure Hasura to use webhook mode to authenticate incoming requests. Understand the process and requirements, and how to control the Hasura Engine's response to user authentication.

auth/authentication/webhook/setup.title: Enabling Webhook Authentication
auth/authentication/webhook/setup.description: Learn how to set up your Hasura DDN project with Webhook mode to authenticate requests and apply access-control rules.

auth/authentication/webhook/special-role.title: Enabling Admin and Unauthenticated Requests
auth/authentication/webhook/special-role.description: Learn how to make admin-level and unauthenticated requests to a Hasura DDN instance with a webhook.

auth/authorization/index.title: Hasura Authorization
auth/authorization/index.description: Explore how to manage authorization in the Hasura Data Delivery Network (DDN). Understand how to utilize permissions in Hasura, with guides on how to control and access various elements such as output types, models, and commands within your data domain.

auth/overview.title: Authentication and Authorization Overview
auth/overview.description: Learn about Hasura's powerful authentication process. Understand its flexibility to use JWT, webhook, role emulation and your existing solutions. Control user access to data.

business-logic/go.title: Custom Business Logic via Go
business-logic/go.description: Explore how to mutate data using the Go data connector.

business-logic/introduction.title: Introduction to Lambda Connectors
business-logic/introduction.description: Learn about lambda connectors and how they simplify data enrichment and transformation.

business-logic/overview.title: Business Logic
business-logic/overview.description: Learn how to incorporate custom business logic directly into your GraphQL API.

business-logic/plugins/introduction.title: Introduction
business-logic/plugins/introduction.description: Explore the Engine Plugins. Understand the architecture of engine plugins and how they can be used to add new functionalities on top of DDN

business-logic/plugins/overview.title: Engine Plugins
business-logic/plugins/overview.description: Learn about Hasura's powerful plugins architecture.

business-logic/plugins/quickstart.title: Quickstart
business-logic/plugins/quickstart.description: Explore the Engine Plugins. Understand how they can be used to add new functionalities on top of the Hasura DDN

business-logic/python.title: Custom Business Logic via Python
business-logic/python.description: Explore how to mutate data using the Python data connector.

business-logic/typescript.title: Custom Business Logic via TypeScript
business-logic/typescript.description: Explore how to mutate data using the TypeScript data connector.

deployment/architecture.description: Architecture of Hasura DDN: The Supergraph Platform

deployment/deployment/create-a-project.description: Learn how to get started with Hasura DDN and your GraphQL API.

deployment/deployment/deploy-a-connector.description: Learn how to get started with Hasura DDN and your GraphQL API.

deployment/deployment/deploy-your-superg.description: Learn how to get started with Hasura DDN and your GraphQL API.

deployment/deployment/index.description: Learn how to get started with Hasura DDN and your GraphQL API.

deployment/overview.title: Deployment
deployment/overview.description: Deployment options for Hasura DDN: The Supergraph Platform

deployment/private/data-plane-collaborat.title: DDN Data Plane Collaboration
deployment/private/data-plane-collaborat.description: Learn how to use the data plane collaboration feature for Private DDN.

deployment/private/hasura-hosted.title: Hasura-Hosted (VPC)
deployment/private/hasura-hosted.description: Learn how you use a VPC with Hasura DDN and have us host your API without any access to the public internet.

deployment/private/self-hosted/index.title: Self-Hosted (BYOC)
deployment/private/self-hosted/index.description: Learn how to self-host your own instance of Hasura DDN.

deployment/private/self-hosted/self-host.title: Self-Hosted (Customer Managed) Data Plane Installation Guide
deployment/private/self-hosted/self-host.description: Learn how to install a Self-Hosted (Customer Managed) Data Plane.

deployment/serverless.title: Serverless Edge Deployment
deployment/serverless.description: Learn how Hasura delivers your API using serverless-edge technology, out of the box!

graphql-api/apollo-federation.title: Apollo Federation
graphql-api/apollo-federation.description: Hasura DDN can be used as a subgraph in a supergraph built using Apollo Federation

graphql-api/errors.title: GraphQL API Errors
graphql-api/errors.description: Learn about error responses from the Hasura DDN GraphQL API

graphql-api/global-ids.title: Global IDs
graphql-api/global-ids.description: A Global ID is a unique identifier for an object across the entire application, not just within a specific table or type. Think of it as an ID which you can use to fetch any object directly, regardless of what kind of object it is. This is different from typical database IDs, which are often guaranteed unique only within a particular table. Hasura's Global ID implementation can be used to provide options for GraphQL clients to elegantly handle caching and data re-fetching in a predictable and standardized way. The Global ID generated by Hasura DDN follows the Relay Global ID spec.

graphql-api/graphql-schema-diff.title: GraphQL Schema Diff
graphql-api/graphql-schema-diff.description: Compare two supergraph builds to understand the changes in the graphql schema and the impact on the existing queries and mutations.

graphql-api/mutations/index.title: GraphQL Mutations
graphql-api/mutations/index.description: In-depth guide to conducting GraphQL Queries and harnessing the full potential of Hasura's GraphQL API. Discover functionalities like simple queries, nesting, sorting, pagination, and employing multiple arguments or queries. Learn more about filtering queries and the use of variables, aliases, fragments, and directives.

graphql-api/overview.title: Queries Overview
graphql-api/overview.description: Get details on how to handle and interact with your databases using Hasura's GraphQL API. Learn methods to initialize data connectors and manage queries effectively.

graphql-api/queries/filters/boolean-oper.title: Filter by Boolean Expressions
graphql-api/queries/filters/boolean-oper.description: Discover how to build complex boolean expressions for Hasura-related query filtering in API data. This guide includes examples of using '_not', '_and', and, '_or' operators for improved data filtering.

graphql-api/queries/filters/comparison-o.title: Filter by Comparing Values
graphql-api/queries/filters/comparison-o.description: This documentation page provides a comprehensive overview on how to use comparison operators, such as equality and varying degrees of greater or less than operators, to filter and refine your Hasura API data queries. Topical examples are included for a variety of data types, including integers, strings, and booleans.

graphql-api/queries/filters/index.title: Filter Query Results / Search Queries
graphql-api/queries/filters/index.description: Master the process of filtering query results using Hasura with this comprehensive guide. Learn the syntax, use of arguments, operators and more to build search queries and filter data. Cover filtering based on field values, nested objects, and using comparison, logical, and text search operators for refined results.

graphql-api/queries/filters/nested-objec.title: Filter Based on Nested Objects Fields
graphql-api/queries/filters/nested-objec.description: Acquire proficiency use and filter query results with Hasura's nested objects fields. This guide provides explicit methodologies, practical examples, and common use-cases.

graphql-api/queries/filters/performance-.title: Performance of Relationship Comparisons
graphql-api/queries/filters/performance-.description: Understand and evaluate the query performance when relationship are involved in filter predicates.

graphql-api/queries/filters/text-search-.title: Filter by Text
graphql-api/queries/filters/text-search-.description: Explore various operators for pattern matching on string/text fields with Hasura GraphQL engine, including _like, _nlike, _ilike, _nilike, _similar, _nsimilar, _regex, _nregex, _iregex, and _niregex. Learn how to use these operators to filter query results and conduct text search.

graphql-api/queries/index.title: GraphQL Queries
graphql-api/queries/index.description: In-depth guide to conducting GraphQL Queries and harnessing the full potential of Hasura's GraphQL API. Discover functionalities like simple queries, nesting, sorting, pagination, and employing multiple arguments or queries. Learn more about filtering queries and the use of variables, aliases, fragments, and directives.

graphql-api/queries/multiple-arguments.title: Use Multiple Query Arguments
graphql-api/queries/multiple-arguments.description: Extend your Hasura usage by learning how to utilize multiple arguments in a single query. This guide breaks down filtering and sorting processes using multiple arguments, enhancing database efficiency and data management.

graphql-api/queries/multiple-queries.title: Multiple Queries in a Request
graphql-api/queries/multiple-queries.description: Explore how to run multiple GraphQL queries in a single request using Hasura. Learn about the processes of sequential execution and fetching unrelated data types simultaneously for efficient data handling and improved API performance.

graphql-api/queries/nested-queries.title: Nested Object Queries
graphql-api/queries/nested-queries.description: Master the usage of nested queries in Hasura with comprehensive examples. Explore object and array relationships for fetching data of related types. Boost your performance in Hasura environment with efficient nested object queries.

graphql-api/queries/pagination.title: Paginate Query Results
graphql-api/queries/pagination.description: Explore how to paginate your query results using Hasura. This guide will showcase how to utilize limit and offset arguments to manage your data pagination, along with practical examples. Get familiar with keyset cursor-based pagination and learn the benefits of using the 'where' clause over 'offset'.

graphql-api/queries/simple-queries.title: Simple Object Queries
graphql-api/queries/simple-queries.description: Boost your proficiency in Hasura's GraphQL API with this comprehensive guide on simple object queries. Learn how to fetch single or multiple nodes, use pagination, sorting and filtering to streamline your data fetching process and more.

graphql-api/queries/sorting.title: Sort Query Results
graphql-api/queries/sorting.description: Sort the results of your queries in Hasura with the 'order_by' argument. Learn how to sort objects, nested objects, and based on nested object's fields.

graphql-api/queries/variables-aliases-fr.title: Use Variables / Aliases / Fragments / Directives in Queries
graphql-api/queries/variables-aliases-fr.description: Explore the use of variables, aliases, fragments, and directives in Hasura queries. Learn to create dynamic and reusable queries, fetch data based on query parameters, and modify your GraphQL query results.

graphql-api/subscriptions/index.title: GraphQL Subscriptions
graphql-api/subscriptions/index.description: Comprehensive guide to working with GraphQL Subscriptions and leveraging the real-time capabilities of Hasura's GraphQL API. Explore functionalities like live updates, filtering, and multiple concurrent subscriptions. Learn more about managing subscriptions effectively, and the use of variables, fragments, and directives.

graphql-api/versioning.title: API Versioning through Field Deprecation
graphql-api/versioning.description: Learn how to version your GraphQL API using the @deprecated tag.

help/billing/overview.title: Billing Overview
help/billing/overview.description: Learn about Hasura DDN's pricing, plans, and billing set-up.

help/billing/pricing.title: Plans and Pricing
help/billing/pricing.description: Learn about Hasura DDN Billing and Pricing - Find details on simple, consistent pricing independent of traffic, with no extra costs for growing usage. View pricing for models, zones, and data transfers across free, base, and advanced plans. Ideal for developers and teams of all sizes.

help/billing/setup.title: Billing
help/billing/setup.description: Learn how easy it is to set up billing for a Hasura DDN project.

help/faq.title: Hasura FAQ
help/faq.description: Explore the Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) for Hasura DDN and get essential insights about its architecture, CI/CD features, benefits for developers, data connectivity, and more. Understand how Hasura DDN is transforming API management and modern application development.

help/glossary.title: Hasura DDN Glossary
help/glossary.description: Explore the key terms and definitions used within Hasura DDN (Data Delivery Network), including concepts such as metadata specification, native data connectors, and more. Gain a better understanding of how to design and manage the Hasura architecture effectively.

help/index.title: Support
help/index.description: Learn how to get help with your Hasura DDN project

how-to-build-with-ddn/overview.title: Getting Started
how-to-build-with-ddn/overview.description: Learn how to get started with Hasura DDN and your GraphQL API.

how-to-build-with-ddn/with-clickhouse.title: Get Started with Hasura DDN and ClickHouse
how-to-build-with-ddn/with-clickhouse.description: Learn the basics of Hasura DDN and how to get started with a ClickHouse database.

how-to-build-with-ddn/with-mongodb.title: Get Started with Hasura DDN and MongoDB
how-to-build-with-ddn/with-mongodb.description: Learn the basics of Hasura DDN and how to get started with a MongoDB database.

how-to-build-with-ddn/with-others.title: Get Started with Hasura DDN and other Sources
how-to-build-with-ddn/with-others.description: Learn the basics of Hasura DDN and how to get started with other sources.

how-to-build-with-ddn/with-postgresql.title: Get Started with Hasura DDN and PostgreSQL
how-to-build-with-ddn/with-postgresql.description: Learn the basics of Hasura DDN and how to get started with a Postgres database.

index.title: Hasura DDN Documentation
index.description: Explore comprehensive documentation on the Hasura Data Delivery Network (DDN). Discover its ability to generate instant GraphQL APIs on various data sources and the suite of developer tools it offers for increased productivity and management. Learn how Hasura DDN can enable your backend teams to provide data access from the edge efficiently and securely.

observability/explain/api-reference.title: Explain API Reference
observability/explain/api-reference.description: Dive into the comprehensive guide for the Hasura Explain API. Understand how to analyze GraphQL queries, interpret execution plans, and optimize your API interactions for improved performance.

observability/explain/index.title: Explain Overview
observability/explain/index.description: Explore Hasura's GraphQL query execution with this guide. Learn about various execution types like ModelSelect, CommandSelect, and HashJoin, and understand how Hasura's DDN optimizes query performance.

observability/metrics.title: Metrics
observability/metrics.description: Learn how to leverage metrics to track user requests across various services in the Hasura Data Delivery Network. Understand how to diagnose and debug potential failure points and monitor performance for better application management.

observability/model-analytics/field.title: Field Analytics
observability/model-analytics/field.description: Dive into the comprehensive guide for the Hasura Field level analytics. Understand the fields frequency of access and how each field is used within your models.

observability/model-analytics/index.title: Model Analytics Overview
observability/model-analytics/index.description: Monitor the operations made and fields used for models/commands with Hasura's Model Analytics.

observability/model-analytics/operation.title: Operation Analytics
observability/model-analytics/operation.description: Dive into the comprehensive guide for the Hasura Operation level analytics. Understand how different operations (queries and mutations) are interacting with your models and commands.

observability/overview.title: Observability
observability/overview.description: Explore Hasura's observability tools that optimize the monitoring and debugging of your GraphQL API. Learn about performance check, error debugging, and gaining insights into the use of your GraphQL API for increased productivity and efficiency.

observability/platform-dashboard.title: Platform Dashboard
observability/platform-dashboard.description: The Platform Dashboard is a comprehensive reporting tool designed to provide insights into the performance, security, and usage of the Data Delivery Netowork

observability/traces.title: Traces
observability/traces.description: Learn how to leverage OpenTelemetry traces to track user requests across various services in the Hasura Data Delivery Network. Understand how to diagnose and debug potential failure points and monitor performance for better application management.

projects/collaboration/best-practices.title: Best Practices for Collaboration
projects/collaboration/best-practices.description: Learn how to collaborate with others on a project.

projects/collaboration/comment.title: Commenting on Metadata
projects/collaboration/comment.description: Collaborate with your peers by commenting on your Supergraph Metadata

projects/collaboration/federation.title: Onboard Teams
projects/collaboration/federation.description: Learn how to invite others to a collaborate on a subgraph.

projects/collaboration/index.title: Collaborate
projects/collaboration/index.description: Learn how to get collaborate with others on a DDN project.

projects/collaboration/invite.title: Invite Collaborators
projects/collaboration/invite.description: Learn how to invite others to a project.

projects/collaboration/overview.title: Collaboration
projects/collaboration/overview.description: Hasura DDN allows multiple users and teams to work together as collaborators on projects by assigning each user specific roles and permissions.

projects/project-configuration/builds.title: Supergraph Builds
projects/project-configuration/builds.description: Learn about Hasura Data Delivery Network's (DDN) build management. Understand how to create, apply, and delete builds associated with your projects, the importance of the build lifecycle, and testing your API. Also, discover how to leverage Hasura CLI commands for smoother transitions from development to production.

projects/project-configuration/contexts.title: Contexts

projects/project-configuration/custom-sc.title: Custom scripts
projects/project-configuration/custom-sc.description: Learn about executing custom scripts using the DDN CLI

projects/project-configuration/metadata-.title: Generating metadata
projects/project-configuration/metadata-.description: Learn about generating metadata and customizing it using the DDN CLI

projects/project-configuration/overview.title: Project Configuration
projects/project-configuration/overview.description: Learn how metadata is configured in Hasura DDN with projects and subgraphs and how to create builds.

projects/project-configuration/projects.title: Projects
projects/project-configuration/projects.description: Learn how to effectively create, configure, and manage data supergraphs with Hasura DDN. Dive into project initialization, build profiles, supergraphs, and subgraphs. Explore usage of the Hasura CLI for streamlined project management and efficient data supergraph creation, configuration, and deployment.

projects/project-configuration/subgraphs.title: Subgraphs
projects/project-configuration/subgraphs.description: Explore Hasura's subgraphs functionality designed for multi-team projects. Understand the process of metadata object management, subgraph-specific guidelines, and data source ownership within Hasura. Discover how subgraphs facilitate efficient organization and controlled access to project metadata, enhancing team collaboration on Hasura projects.

reference/cli/commands/index.title: DDN CLI: Commands
reference/cli/commands/index.description: DDN Command Line Interface using the DDN CLI

reference/cli/faq.title: Troubleshooting FAQ
reference/cli/faq.description: Frequently asked questions about the DDN CLI.

reference/cli/installation.title: Installation
reference/cli/installation.description: Explore the step-by-step guide for installing the Hasura Command Line Interface for various systems. Learn how to download, prepare, and move necessary binaries or build from source.

reference/cli/overview.title: Hasura CLI
reference/cli/overview.description: Discover the power of the Hasura CLI, your new tool for managing your Hasura projects directly from your terminal.

reference/metadata-objects/aggregate-exp.title: Aggregate Expressions
reference/metadata-objects/aggregate-exp.description: Explore aggregate expression types in Hasura. Learn how to aggregate different data types and expose them in your API.

reference/metadata-objects/auth-config.title: AuthConfig
reference/metadata-objects/auth-config.description: Configure the authentication configuration used by the API server in Hasura.

reference/metadata-objects/boolean-expre.title: Boolean Expressions
reference/metadata-objects/boolean-expre.description: Explore boolean expression types in Hasura. Learn how to define comparisons between different data types and expose them in your API.

reference/metadata-objects/build-configs.title: Build configs
reference/metadata-objects/build-configs.description: Add as many Supergraph objects as you need to define different configurations for building your supergraph and a Connector object for each connector in your supergraph.

reference/metadata-objects/commands.title: Commands
reference/metadata-objects/commands.description: Begin executing business logic directly from your GraphQL API using Hasura Data Domain Specification commands. Connect to REST endpoints, custom servers or serverless functions and better manage your back-end functions.

reference/metadata-objects/compatibility.title: Compatibility Config
reference/metadata-objects/compatibility.description: CompatibilityConfig is a metadata object that defines the compatibility configuration of the Hasura metadata.

reference/metadata-objects/data-connecto.title: Data Connector Links
reference/metadata-objects/data-connecto.description: Docs for the configuration of data connectors in Hasura. Learn how to connect to SQL & NoSQL databases, REST APIs, GraphQL API and more by specifying a connector URL and schema. Increase flexibility and efficiency by defining schema types, leveraging atomic builds, and implementing structured data model configuration.

reference/metadata-objects/engine-plugin.title: Engine Plugins
reference/metadata-objects/engine-plugin.description: LifecyclePluginHook is a metadata object that defines the configuration for engine lifecyle plugins.

reference/metadata-objects/graphql-confi.title: Configuration for GraphQL API
reference/metadata-objects/graphql-confi.description: Configure the global field/type names for the GraphQL API generated by Hasura for your data domain models.

reference/metadata-objects/introduction.title: Working with Metadata
reference/metadata-objects/introduction.description: Explore the enhanced capabilities of supergraph modeling. Understand how it provides an efficient tool for metadata generation, data source management, and lays the foundation for building API data domains. Learn the mechanism of data connectors and the corresponding specifications, models, commands, relationships, and permissions.

reference/metadata-objects/models.title: Models
reference/metadata-objects/models.description: Explore the concept of Models in Hasura Data Domain, your link between the data sources and the generated API. Learn about models, their structure, source configuration, and how they appear in the GraphQL API. Understand filterable fields, orderable fields, data connector types, and how to configure them. Gain insights on unique identifiers and their role in retrieving unique data objects from the model.

reference/metadata-objects/overview.title: Supergraph Modeling
reference/metadata-objects/overview.description: Understand the power and application of supergraph modeling to create robust Hasura GraphQL APIs. Learn the declarative approach for structuring data and establishing API guidelines, making it reader-friendly and highly efficient.

reference/metadata-objects/permissions.title: Permissions
reference/metadata-objects/permissions.description: This page provides an understanding of how to define permissions, control access or set authorization rules on output types, models, and commands in your supergraph. It essentially makes management of roles and accessibility simple and efficient.

reference/metadata-objects/relationships.title: Relationships
reference/metadata-objects/relationships.description: Expand your understanding of relationships in Hasura, learn how to define linked or nested data queries, create relationships between types and models. Explore mapping relationships with in-depth annotated examples and explore connecting data across namespaces.

reference/metadata-objects/types.title: Types
reference/metadata-objects/types.description: Explore types in Hasura, discover primitive types, custom types and container types. Learn how to define your data structure and map existing data connector scalars to types in your data domain. Understand how these elements form the foundation of your data, allowing for flexibility and seamless interconnection.

schema-design/command.title: Commands Modify Data
schema-design/command.description: Commands allow you to modify data in your data source.

schema-design/federation/architecture.title: Federation Architecture
schema-design/federation/architecture.description: Understand the architecture of subgraph federation in Hasura DDN and how it enables efficient data management across multiple subgraphs, promoting a collaborative development environment.

schema-design/federation/build-commands.title: Federation Build Command Examples
schema-design/federation/build-commands.description: Commands for building supergraphs and subgraphs on Hasura DDN

schema-design/federation/cross-repo-rela.title: Cross-repo Relationships
schema-design/federation/cross-repo-rela.description: Learn how to create relationships across subgraphs in different repositories in Hasura DDN.

schema-design/federation/independent-sub.title: Independent Subgraph Development
schema-design/federation/independent-sub.description: Learn how to manage your Git workflows for both single-repo and multi-repo federation in Hasura DDN. This guide will walk you through setting up version control, collaborating with your team, and deploying your supergraph.

schema-design/federation/overview.title: Data Federation
schema-design/federation/overview.description: Data federation in Hasura DDN enables you to combine data from multiple data sources and query it as if it was a single entity.

schema-design/federation/subgraph-prefix.title: Subgraph GraphQL Root Field and Type Name Prefixing
schema-design/federation/subgraph-prefix.description: Learn how to avoid naming collisions between subgraphs in Hasura DDN by customizing prefixes for root fields and type names.

schema-design/model.title: Models Read Data
schema-design/model.description: Models allow you to define the structure of your data and how it can be queried.

schema-design/overview.title: Data Modeling
schema-design/overview.description: Data modeling with Hasura DDN is simultaneously simple and powerful. Learn how to model your data with Hasura DDN to get the best API performance on top of your data.

schema-design/permissions.title: Permissions Protect Data
schema-design/permissions.description: Permissions allow you to control who can access your data and what they can do with it.

schema-design/relationship.title: Relationships Connect Data
schema-design/relationship.description: Relationships allow you to connect data across different models.

tutorials/authentication/auth0.title: Auth0
tutorials/authentication/auth0.description: Learn how to connect Auth0 to your Hasura DDN supergraph.

tutorials/authentication/aws-cognito.title: AWS Cognito
tutorials/authentication/aws-cognito.description: Learn how to connect AWS Cognito to your Hasura DDN supergraph.

tutorials/authentication/clerk.title: Clerk
tutorials/authentication/clerk.description: Learn how to connect Clerk to your Hasura DDN supergraph.

tutorials/authentication/firebase.title: Firebase
tutorials/authentication/firebase.description: Learn how to connect Firebase to your Hasura DDN supergraph.

tutorials/authentication/index.title: Authentication
tutorials/authentication/index.description: Learn how to connect to various authentication providers with Hasura DDN.

tutorials/authorization/index.title: Authorization
tutorials/authorization/index.description: Learn how to create various access-control rules for your data sources with Hasura DDN.

tutorials/authorization/public-access-ro.title: Public Access
tutorials/authorization/public-access-ro.description: Learn how to create a public-access role that can view data without authentication.

tutorials/authorization/service-account.title: Service Accounts
tutorials/authorization/service-account.description: Learn how to creata a public-access role that can view data without authentication.

tutorials/authorization/simple-user-perm.title: Limit Data to Users
tutorials/authorization/simple-user-perm.description: Learn how to return only data belonging to a user.

tutorials/business-logic/enrich-data-wit.title: Enrich data with LLMs
tutorials/business-logic/enrich-data-wit.description: Learn how to make a request to the OpenAI API and handle responses within your API.

tutorials/business-logic/format-datetime.title: Format Datetime Objects
tutorials/business-logic/format-datetime.description: Learn how to easily format datetime objects and send back human-readable formatted data.

tutorials/business-logic/hash-passwords.title: Hash Passwords
tutorials/business-logic/hash-passwords.description: Learn how to securely hash passwords and handle them within your API.

tutorials/business-logic/http-header-for.title: HTTP Header Forwarding
tutorials/business-logic/http-header-for.description: Learn how to configure Hasura DDN to forward HTTP headers to a lambda connector

tutorials/business-logic/index.title: Custom Business Logic
tutorials/business-logic/index.description: Learn how to incorporate custom business logic directly into your supergraph using common examples.

tutorials/business-logic/translate-conte.title: Translate Content
tutorials/business-logic/translate-conte.description: Learn how to easily translate content and return multiple languages to your clients.

tutorials/business-logic/validate-creden.title: Validate Credentials
tutorials/business-logic/validate-creden.description: Learn how to compare a raw text value to a hashed password as an input to a function.

tutorials/overview.title: Recipes
tutorials/overview.description: Learn about Hasura's powerful plugins architecture.

tutorials/project-config/independent-con.title: Deploy connectors and supergraph independently
tutorials/project-config/independent-con.description: Learn how to manage independent deployments for connectors and the supergraph

tutorials/project-config/index.title: Project configuration
tutorials/project-config/index.description: Recipes on making common updates in the local project configuration.

tutorials/project-config/remove-subgraph.title: Remove a subgraph
tutorials/project-config/remove-subgraph.description: Learn how to remove a subgraph from your local project directory

tutorials/project-config/rename-subgraph.title: Rename a subgraph
tutorials/project-config/rename-subgraph.description: Learn how to rename a subgraph in your local project directory
